channel.title: I need help ASAP!
channel.description:
I need help with changing the IP when I click "Run Server" It loads and looks like this...
Starting pimpscape server on 0.0.0.0:8080
Now I know that I changed the port to 8080 but I dont know how to change the 0.0.0.0 stuff... Please help me and post a reply Thanks. When I put in my no-ip or my computer IP says i cannot log in or w/e but when i put 0.0.0.0 for the IP it lets me in... ~ Jay ~

item.title: I need help ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @King_Dawgs King_Dawgs
item.description:
@King_Dawgs wrote:

0.0.0.0 Is like 127.0.0.1 But is more updated. So no 0.0.0.0 is a non-online server

Read full topic

item.title: I need help ASAP!
item.dc:creator: @GuNtRiX GuNtRiX
item.description:
@GuNtRiX wrote:

Once you have ran your server
Go to http://www.no-ip.com
Then Click “Sign Up Now”
Once you have created your account log in.
Now click “Add”, type in your hostname e.g (oliscape) in the Hostname box.
Below where you just typed your hostname where it says “no-ip.biz” click on it and look for “no-ip.org” and click on that.
Look where it says “IP Address” and type in your IP address you can find that by going onto http://whatsmyip.org/ its right at the top of the page, now put that into the IP box and click create host.
Click the “Downloads” tab at the top of the page then click the box the suits your Operating System download and run.
Once you have opened it you should see you server name and a smile face next to it, make sure the box is ticked now your server.

Read full topic

You don’t need to change the 0.0.0.0

item.title: I need help ASAP!

item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

You can’t change the IP, unless you just use a different no-IP name
